name: You Are Broken
description:
A physics platformer where you have to collect your limbs and fix yourself, despite the game telling you that you are essentially broken.

Controls:

  • Use "A" and "D" to move left and right, and use "Space" to jump.
  • Press "R" to restart the level.
  • Press "Esc" to quit the game.

It is a short game with 5 levels. There is an end.
